Indian Motorcycle launch new five-strong Scout cruiser range in biggest range shake-up in a decade

Indian Motorcycle launch new five-strong Scout cruiser range
Read about the 2024 Indian Scout cruiser range, which marks the most significant change to the line-up for a decade, here with MCN.
www.motorcyclenews.com

I guess they can't be accused of sitting on their bobbers, er laurels.

I like the look of the Super Scout below. At ¬£16,095, $20,200 USD and $27,000.00 CDN they are not cheap with the Honda Rebel 1100 Tour being $15, 800.00 CDN albeit with less power.
